definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Beijing, capital of People's Republic of China/Peking/PRC government
Nanjing subprovincial city on the Changjiang, capital of Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/capital of China at different historical periods
Beijing/capital of People's Republic of China/one of the four municipalities 直轄市|直辖市[zhi2 xia2 shi4]
Tokyo, capital of Japan/Tonkin (northern Vietnam during the French colonial period)
Nanjing subprovincial city on the Changjiang, capital of Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/capital of China at different historical periods
Beijing resident/Peking ape-man, Homo erectus pekinensis (c. 600,000 BC), discovered in 1921 at Zhoukoudian 周口店[Zhou1 kou3 dian4], Beijing
to enter the capital/to go to Beijing

sentences.english: To be responsible for CPC Party-mass work of the Commission and affiliated institutions in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 负责国资委机关和在京直属单位的党群工作。

sentences.english: Men for the provision of health care quality in Beijing massage service, look forward to your call.
sentences.chinese: 为在京素质男士提供保健按摩服务，期待你的来电。

sentences.english: This means they will also have access to compulsory education for free.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着非京籍学生今后也可以在京免费义务教育。

sentences.english: Offer housekeeping & housemaid services for foreign families in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 为在京的外国人士提供家政服务。

sentences.english: Yesterday, Hanting Hotels in Beijing announced the establishment of the North Branch.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，汉庭酒店集团在京宣布成立北方分公司。

sentences.english: Jinyintan bathing place Located at Jingtang Port east side.
sentences.chinese: 金银滩浴场位于京唐港东侧。

sentences.english: But Huang Jiashan had offended the treacherous prime minister Yan Hao.
sentences.chinese: 黄嘉善却在京为官时，得罪了奸相严嵩。

sentences.english: Core Pacific is one of the Participants who are ready for dealing in RMB securities.
sentences.chinese: 京华山一已成为合资格人民币证券交易证券商之一。

sentences.english: After operating for a decade, we have established good social relations in Beijing, as well as an outstanding and united management team.
sentences.chinese: 我公司在京发展已经有十年，拥有良好的社会关系。

sentences.english: Distance of Jinghang Canal, Olympic Garden only 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 距离京航运河，奥林匹克花园仅5分钟。

sentences.english: To directly regulate some non-banking financial institutions registered in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 负责直接监管部分在京注册的非银行金融机构。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Beijing on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至北京经济客位机票乙张。

sentences.english: Beijing is located in the north central Bali play magni mountains, from terengganu Barcelona 68 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 京打马尼位于巴厘中部北边山区，离登巴萨68公里。

sentences.english: The climate of Beijing is colder than that of Guangzhou.
If people inBeijingwant to get fresh litchis, they could buy some from fruit stands last week.
sentences.chinese: 在京欲食鲜荔枝者，上周可在果摊觅得。

sentences.english: To be responsible for air defense by people of Central Government institutions and their affiliated institutions in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 负责中央国家机关及所属在京单位人民防空工作。

definition: saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
to store/to stand/space between the door and the entrance screen
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
short name for Hebei 河北 province/surname Ji
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
